summary: Utility module that implements a lightweight client for interacting with an Artifactory server during tests, handling authentication, repository creation, and queries for package and recipe existence, revision timestamps, and URL construction, as well as a store component for persisting and retrieving version metadata.
business_intent: Enable automated test suites for Conan to programmatically manage Artifactory resources, verify package and recipe availability, and track revisions without manual setup, thereby streamlining continuous integration and validation of package workflows.
